chapter.title: Presentation

theme.title: Syllabus
theme.para: This eMusicBook is intended to help one improve one's reading skills, providing sort of practice, exercises, and drills that are required in order to become a good sightreader.
Appart of introducing new rhythmic cells, of increasing complexity, the main concepts introduced in Level 1 are:

orderedlist.listitem: The stave. Treble (G) and bass (F) clefs. Names of notes on the stave. Extension of the stave to include two ledger lines below and above each stave.
Note values of semibreve, minim, crotchet, quaver and semiquaver, and their equivalent rests. Tied notes. Single-dotted notes and rests.
Simple time signatures of 2/4, 3/4 and 4/4 and compound time signature of 6/8. Bar-lines and the grouping of the notes listed above within these times.
Key signatures of all major and minor keys up to and including two sharps and flats.

chapter.theme:
Book organization
This course has 31 lessons covering the following material:
Music notation basics:
Clefs and y ámbitos: En las primeras lecciones sólo se usa la clave de Sol (lecciones 1 a 7) con un ámbito muy reducido (e4-g4). Progresivamente el ámbito va aumentando para llegar, en la lección 7 a c4-f5. En la lección 8 se introduce la clave de Fa en 4ª, de nuevo con un ámbito muy reducido (a3;c4) y a partir de ahí en todas las lecciones siguientes (8 a 26) se usa indistintamente la clave de Fa y la de Sol, cada una de ellas con ámbitos progresivos, para finalizar con dos líneas adicionales por arriba y por abajo en ambas claves (Sol: a3-c6 y Fa: a2-e4).
Time signatures: En las primeras lecciones (1 a 10) sólo se usa el 2/4. Luego, progresivamente se amplia a 3/4 (lecciones 11 y 12) y a 4/4 (lecciones 13 a 21). Finalmente se introduce la subdivisión ternaria con el compás de 6/8 (lecciones 22 a 26).
Key signatures: En las dos primeras lecciones sólo Do mayor/La menor. A partir de ahí se introduce una alteración (lecciones 3-10). Y en el resto del curso se manejan hasta dos alteraciones (lecciones 11-26).

theme.title: Lessons' structure
theme.para: With exception of the firsts lessons, oriented to introduce the basic concepts of the musica notation, the remaining lessons are structured into three sections:

itemizedlist.listitem: In the first one the new concepts and rhythmic patterns introduced in the lesson are explained.
In the second section, optional, the new concepts are compared with known ones, so that the student can better relate the new material and learn it.
Finally, in the third section some exercises are proposed to learn and practise the new concepts introduced.
